description:
Focus on the task at hand

Delist provides a different take on to-do lists, allowing you to think less and get more done.

Collect

Create collections to gather all your tasks and ideas.

Organize

Choose the order in which you wish to complete your tasks: newest first, oldest first, or random.

Focus

Delist helps you focus by showing only one task at a time.

Offline, ad-free, and open source

No advertisements, annoying notifications, intrusive permissions, or trackers in this app. Your data is yours. The complete source code is available under an open-source license (GPLv3).
